document.full_text: the mother of the miami heat star lebron james was arrested by miami beach police after she reportedly assaulted a valet worker because it was taking too long to have her car delivered.
document.title: lebron james's mom charged in hotel altercation
lines_and_colors: the mother of the miami heat star lebron james was arrested by miami beach police after she reportedly assaulted a valet worker because it was taking too long to have her car delivered.
